I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

this: nid

A: Type

Goal:
always s p P -> s \In coherent

Premises:
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this
always : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> (state -> proc A -> Prop) -> Prop
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
alw_coh' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In coherent
always_sc : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> seq schedule -> (state -> proc A -> Prop) -> Prop
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc A -> schedule -> state -> proc A -> Prop
pstep : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc A -> schedule -> state -> proc A -> Prop
proc_progress : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule), s \In Coh W -> safe p sc s -> good p sc -> exists (s' : state) (p' : proc A), pstep s p sc s' p'
schedule_ind : forall P : schedule -> Prop, P ActStep -> P SeqRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (SeqStep s)) -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (InjectStep s)) -> P InjectRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (WithInvStep s)) -> P WithInvRet -> forall s : schedule, P s
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A ->...-> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
safe : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> schedule -> state -> Prop
WithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A
Seq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
Inject : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A
Actions.Action : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a_safe : state -> Prop), (forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W) -> forall a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop, (forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r) -> (forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2) -> Actions.action W V this
ProtocolWithInvariant.stIn : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I) (s : ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I), s \In ProtocolWithInvariant.sts ii -> ProtocolWithInvariant.snd_transI (ProtocolWithInvariant.st_inv (s:=s)) \In snd_trans (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)
good : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> schedule -> Prop
Ret : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), A -> proc A
Actions.safe_local : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall s : state, Actions.skip_safe W s -> coh p (getStatelet s l)
with_inv_coh : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s : state), s \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> s \In Coh (mkWorld pr)
pcat : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc A -> (A -> Pred (proc B)) -> Simpl_Pred (proc B)
cohUnKR : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s \In Coh U -> hook_complete W -> s' \In Coh W
cohUnKL : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s' \In Coh W -> hook_complete U -> s \In Coh U
Act : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), action W A this -> proc A
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
Actions.skip_safe = fun W : world => [eta Coh W] : world -> state -> Prop
projectS_cohR : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W2 -> projectS W2 s \In Coh W2
projectS_cohL : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W1 -> projectS W1 s \In Coh W1

```coq
intros.
destruct H as [scs Pscs].
apply alw_coh'.
exists scs.
auto.
Qed.```

original: intros. destruct H as [scs Pscs]. apply alw_coh'. exists scs. auto.
